name: Ancient Evil (itch) (Musialkov)
description:
As the chosen one you must save the land of Gryneland from the ancient evil.

Settings

Left Mouse Button - Choosing action

L - List of quests

I - Equipment

ESC - Pause Menu

1-6 - Action Buttons

Advices

To activate a weapon or potion, drag it to the action slot and press the appropriate button

After level up, your health and mana will recover to the maximum level

Instalation

Download the file, unzip it and play! :)
